text: Illya Kovalenko (; born 20 March 1990) is a professional Ukrainian football midfielder who currently plays for FC Inhulets Petrove in the Ukrainian First League. Kovalenko is a product of the FC Stal Dniprodzerzhynsk football academy. He became noticeable during the 2016-17 Ukrainian First League season when he scored 12 goals playing for Obolon-Brovar and Desna. ==References == ==External links== * * Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:FC Stal Kamianske players Category:FC Naftovyk-Ukrnafta Okhtyrka players Category:FC Hirnyk Kryvyi Rih players Category:FC Poltava players Category:FC Obolon-Brovar Kyiv players Category:FC Desna Chernihiv players Category:PFC Sumy players Category:FC Inhulets Petrove players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Ukrainian First League players
title: Illya Kovalenko
